UI_EventsKeyboard_code_values.summary: The following tables show what code values are used for each native scancode or virtual keycode on major platforms. The reason is that some browsers choose to interpret physical keys differently, there are some differences in which keys map to which codes. These tables show those variations when known.

UI_EventsKeyboard_key_values.summary: The tables below list the standard values for the KeyboardEvent.key property, with an explanation of what the key is typically used for. Corresponding virtual keycodes for common platforms are included where available.
